infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Bookshelf Scanner needs access to your camera to take photos of your bookshelf. When you take a photo, the app uses AI to automatically identify book titles and authors from the book spines visible in the image. For example, if you photograph a bookshelf containing 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald, the app will detect and catalog this book automatically.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Bookshelf Scanner needs access to your photo library to select existing photos of bookshelves. When you choose a photo, the app uses AI to automatically identify book titles and authors from the book spines visible in the image. For example, if you select a photo of your bookshelf, the app will scan it and add all detected books like 'To Kill a Mockingbird' by Harper Lee to your digital library.
